short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate through liked posts on LinkedIn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A smart Chrome extension that helps you easily navigate through liked posts on LinkedIn.

Key Features
- Quick navigation between liked posts using floating buttons
- Drag & drop positioning of navigation controls
- Works on multiple LinkedIn pages: feed, Company pages, Search results, Activity feeds
- Enable/disable with one click
- Position memory: saves your preferred button location
- Clean, minimal design that matches LinkedIn's interface

Why Use It?
- Save time finding posts you've liked
- No more endless scrolling
- Perfect for content creators and social media managers
- Simple and intuitive to use

Install now to transform how you browse LinkedIn!
